item.title: Pepe Brogna: Underground Session 012
item.description: YO YO YO.. It's been a long time.. but I'm back with a Deep-, Afro- & Soulful-Mix.. I hope you enjoy it! Respect to all musicians, producers and listeners of housemusic.. keep listening and buying this hot music.. for those who can't get enough - next upload as soon as possible!! :-) ..thanks for listening and promoting it! Playlist: 01. Boddhi Satva "Punch Koko" (Main Mix) 02. Nigel Hayes "Back Together" (Abacus Remix) 03. Stephanie Cooke "Everything" (95 North Deep Jersey Mix) 04. Oriental Funk Stew "Sweet Melody" (Fred Everything) 05. Master At Work "To Be In Love" (Frankie Feliciano Remix) 06. LeFunken feat. Stephanie Renée "Knowing" (Main Mix) 07. Louis Benedetti "Time To Let Go" (Original) 08. Jill Scott "Whatever" (Scott Wozniak Mix) 09. Special: Nova Fronteira "Irmao" (Club Mix) http://myspace.com/djpepebrogna http://twitter.com/pepebrogna http://www.facebook.com/pages/PEPE-BROGNA/54435455700
item.dc:creator: Pepe Brogna

item.title: Pepe Brogna: Underground Session 011
item.description: Yo brothers and sisters... Yes, this is the latest session.. and yes, i hope you'll like it ;-) ..comments, messages & friend-requests are as always very welcome.. thanks for the support :-D For those who want to see the playlist.. check! 01. Louis Benedetti „Another Night“ (Main Mix) 02. Candy Apple „No 1“ (Jihad Muhammad Remix) 03. Vega feat. Johnny Dangerous „London Roots“ (Main Mix) 04. Gabriel Rene feat. J. Soul „Spirit“ (Doruk Ozlen Vocal) 05. Kem „Love Is Just A Call Away“ (Main Vocal Mix) 06. Soulphiction „Ghana Wadada“ (The Lost Men Rmx) 07. Eastwest Connection „Once I’ve Been There“ (Original Mix) 08. Tortured Soul „I Might Do Something Wrong“ (Lonely Mix) 09. Kindred The Soul Family „House Of Love“ (Tea Party) 10. D. S. L „Soothe Your Soul“ (Original Club Mix) 11. Osunlade „Passage-It“ (Stefan Goldmann) ..and for those who can't get enough - follow the links.. http://www.myspace.com/djpepebrogna http://twitter.com/pepebrogna "P"

item.title: Pepe Brogna: Underground Session 010
item.description: Hola familia.. Lying in the sun.. and having so much fun.. relax and enjoy - enjoy - enjoy! Thank you very much for the support last month.. I enjoyed every comment and message.. and i hope that you will download this little piece of mine.. another one-hour mix of pure deep-housemusic with some afro-grooves.. stay tuned and keep staying in touch.. more music coming in the next few days/weeks.. ;-) Playlist: 01. Melchyor A "Hot Buttered" (Groovin’ Drum Mix) 02. Double "Shake" (Eric Kupper Club Mix) 03. Unknown Artist 04. Boddhi Satva "Punch Koko" (Main Mix) 05. Osunlade "Dentro Mi Alma" 06. Oriental Funk Stew "Sweet Melody" (Fred Everything and Oliver Desmet) 07. Black Coffee "Turn Me On" 08. Nigel Hayes "Back Together" (Abacus Remix) 09. Unknown Artist 10. Jimpster "Dangly Panther EP" (Original) If you are in Basel (Switzerland) this saturday.. join me at baselcitystudios.. ;-) big party with Mobilee-Lady - ANJA SCHNEIDER on the decks... Love "P" http://www.myspace.com/djpepebrogna http://www.twitter.com/pepebrogna CATCH ME ON FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/pages/PEPE-BROGNA/54435455700
item.dc:creator: Pepe Brogna
item.itunes:summary:
Hola familia..
Lying in the sun.. and having so much fun.. relax and enjoy - enjoy - enjoy!
Thank you very much for the support last month.. I enjoyed every comment and message.. and i hope that you will download this little piece of mine.. another one-hour mix of pure deep-housemusic with some afro-grooves.. stay tuned and keep staying in touch.. more music coming in the next few days/weeks.. ;-)
Playlist:
01. Melchyor A "Hot Buttered" (Groovin’ Drum Mix) 02. Double "Shake" (Eric Kupper Club Mix) 03. Unknown Artist 04. Boddhi Satva "Punch Koko" (Main Mix) 05. Osunlade "Dentro Mi Alma" 06. Oriental Funk Stew "Sweet Melody" (Fred Everything and Oliver Desmet) 07. Black Coffee "Turn Me On" 08. Nigel Hayes "Back Together" (Abacus Remix) 09. Unknown Artist 10. Jimpster "Dangly Panther EP" (Original)
If you are in Basel (Switzerland) this saturday.. join me at baselcitystudios.. ;-) big party with Mobilee-Lady - ANJA SCHNEIDER on the decks...
Love "P"
http://www.myspace.com/djpepebrogna http://www.twitter.com/pepebrogna
CATCH ME ON FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/pages/PEPE-BROGNA/54435455700
